function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Testing hypothesis about the effect of coping methods on different types of buildings","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate or biased demographic analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty of the population size of the study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Random sampling selection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty of collecting information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper training and guidance on covid-19 exposure sources and prevention measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible lack of effective preventive measures in the real estate industry","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of the relationship between built environments and covid-19 transmission","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on outdated prevention and control methods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of risk assessment and management in building services maintenance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of systemic study on covid-19 response in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient knowledge and guidance on combating covid-19 in facilities management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear relation between environmental contamination and clinical infection","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission route through stool viral shedding","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate decontamination measures for air outlets and equipment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 in warmer climates","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hvac system potentially contributing to airborne pathogen transmission","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in air and on surfaces in healthcare environments","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of exposure to sars-cov-2 due to work-related hazards","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in covid-19 risk levels","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effect of temperature on virus spread","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 in the built environment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collection and analysis during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about technical responses to infections in workplaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in health and safety risks based on work environment outdoors vs. enclosed","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interdependent relation between health and the built environment in controlling covid-19 spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unknown factors in the management of covid-19 pandemic and its impact on property management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of epidemic diseases impacting sustainable development","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 impacting the construction industry","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Model 1 not adjusted for employment status in models estimating sickness benefit transfers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Model 2 not adjusted for chronic conditions, any psychiatric condition, and physical activity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of diagnosis related groups charges and outpatient charges for unit cost estimates may not accurately capture the full cost of treatment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on market price for prescription medicines may not reflect the actual cost incurred by the healthcare system.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analysis of sickness benefit transfers may not fully represent the economic impact of long-term sickness absence.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible underestimation of the impact of long-term sick leave on productivity and economic costs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conservative estimation of the cost reductions associated with flourishing over the short-term, without considering long-term flourishing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to disclose potential conflicts of interest and financial relationships related to the submitted work","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Missing data on alcohol consumption, smoking, and nutrition could lead to unadjusted factors and potential mediators in the analysis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Flourishing assessment based on a specific conceptualization of flourishing, potentially excluding other important components such as character and virtue.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible overadjustment in the analytical models by accounting for past healthcare utilization and health status, leading to biased results.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Statistical uncertainty related to selection bias","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of generalizability to other countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low response rate to the survey","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequalities in response rates based on gender, age, education, marital status, employment, immigration status, and income","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The interplay between individual, community, and societal factors in promoting mental health and well-being","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in flourishing prevalence contributing to escalating healthcare expenditure.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on promoting mental health and well-being.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential lack of causal evidence for relationship between mental health and healthcare expenditure","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hypothetical scenario of moving population to a flourishing state","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association between well-being and lower healthcare costs and sickness benefit transfers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
